entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow in outlying areas. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow in outlying areas this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
